atk-s0512a:2029_3: tathā ramaṇīyesu ārāmuyyānapāsādataḷākādīsu araññāyatanesu ca kāyacittasantāpābhāvena abhinibbutattā attanā sukhaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0512a:2029_4: yañca suṇāti buddhānubuddhapaccekabuddhā mahābodhisattā ca nekkhammapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārabhūtaṃ
atk-s0512a:2030_0: Samāhitabhūmiyaṃ pana patiṭṭhito attanā yathānubhūtaṃ visesādhigamanibbattaṃ pītiṃ passaddhiṃ sukhaṃ
atk-s0512a:2030_1: samādhiṃ yathābhūtañāṇañca sattesu adhimuccanto upasaṃharati pariṇāmeti.
atk-s0512a:2030_2: Tathā mahati saṃsāradukkhe tassa ca nimittabhūte kilesābhisaṅkhāradukkhe nimuggaṃ sattanikāyaṃ disvā
atk-s0512a:2030_3: tatrāpi chedanabhedanaphālanapiṃsanaggisantāpādijanitā dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā nirantaraṃ cirakālaṃ
atk-s0512a:2030_6: jotimālākulasarīre khuppipāsāvātātapādīhi ḍayhamāne ca visussamāne ca vantakheḷādiāhāre uddhabāhuṃ viravante
atk-s0512a:2030_8: pariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ mahantaṃ anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇante hatthacchedādikāraṇāyogena dubbaṇṇaduddasikadaliddādibhāvena
atk-s0512a:2030_9: khuppipāsādiābādhayogena balavantehi abhibhavanīyato paresaṃ vahanato parādhīnato ca,
atk-s0512a:2030_13: aggikkhandhe viya anupasantapariḷāhavuttike anupasantanihataparādhīne kāmāvacaradeve ca,
atk-s0512a:2030_14: mahatā vāyāmena vidūramākāsaṃ vigāhitasakuntā viya balavatā dūre pāṇinā khittasarā viya ca,
atk-s0512a:2030_15: satipi cirappavattiyaṃ aniccantikatāya pātapariyosānā anatikkantajātijarāmaraṇā evāti rūpārūpāvacaradeve
atk-s0512a:2030_16: ca passantena mahantaṃ saṃvegaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā mettāya karuṇāya ca anodhiso sattā pharitabbā.
atk-s0512a:2030_17: Evaṃ kāyena vācāya manasā ca bodhisambhāre nirantaraṃ upacinantena yathā pāramiyo pāripūriṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0512a:2030_18: evaṃ sakkaccakārinā sātaccakārinā anolīnavuttinā ussāho pavattetabbo,
atk-s0512a:2031_30: navalokuttarāvakkantīti evamādikā sabbāpi bodhisambhārapaṭipatti vīriyānubhāveneva samijjhatīti abhinīhārato
atk-s0512a:2031_31: yāva mahābodhi anossajjantena sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ vīriyaṃ yathā uparūpari visesāvahaṃ hoti,
atk-s0512a:2031_33: Sampajjamāne ca yathāvutte vīriye khantisaccādhiṭṭhānādayo ca dānasīlādayo ca sabbepi bodhisambhārā tadadhīnavuttitāya
atk-s0512a:2031_34: sampannā eva hontīti khantiādīsupi imināva nayena paṭipatti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a:2032_0: Iti sattānaṃ sukhūpakaraṇapariccāgena bahudhā anuggahakaraṇaṃ dānena paṭipatti,
atk-s0512a:2032_9: upekkhāya nesaṃ upakārāpakāresu vikārānāpattīti evaṃ aparimāṇe satte ārabbha anukampitasabbasattassa
atk-s0512a:2032_10: mahābodhisattassa puthujjanehi asādhāraṇo aparimeyyo puññañāṇasambhārūpacayo ettha paṭipattīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2033_4: Tattha katābhinīhārassa bodhisattassa parahitakaraṇābhininnāsayapayogassa kaṇhadhammavokiṇṇā sukkadhammā pāramiyo eva,
atk-s0512a:2034_0: Evaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānesu paṇidhānārambhapariniṭṭhānesu tesaṃ vibhāgoti apare.
atk-s0512a:2034_2: Lajjāsatimānāpassayānaṃ lokuttaradhammādhipatīnaṃ sīlasamādhipaññāgarukānaṃ tāritataritatārayitūnaṃ anubuddhapaccekabuddhasammāsambuddhānaṃ pāramī,
atk-s0512a:2035_6: Tathā puttadārādikassa tividhassāpi hetu avītikkamanavasena tisso sīlapāramiyo,
atk-s0512a:2035_7: tesu eva tividhesu vatthūsu ālayaṃ upacchinditvā nikkhamanavasena tisso nekkhammapāramiyo,
atk-s0512a:2035_8: upakaraṇaṅgajīvitataṇhaṃ samūhanitvā sattānaṃ hitāhitavinicchayakaraṇavasena tisso paññāpāramiyo.
atk-s0512a:2035_14: upakaraṇādiupaghātakesupi sattesu mettāya avijahanavasena tisso mettāpāramiyo,
atk-s0512a:2035_15: yathāvuttavatthuttayassa upakārāpakāresu sattasaṅkhāresu majjhattatāpaṭilābhavasena tisso upekkhāpāramiyoti evamādinā etāsaṃ vibhāgo veditabbāti.
atk-s0512a:2036_1: Ettha pana yathā etā vibhāgato tiṃsavidhāpi dānapāramiādibhāvato dasavidhā,
atk-s0512a:2036_5: nīvaraṇavivekabhāve pana jhānapāramiyā kusaladhammabhāve chahipi saṅgahitā.
atk-s0512a:2037_0: Etesañca dānādīnaṃ channaṃ guṇānaṃ aññamaññasambandhānaṃ pañcadasayugalādīni pañcadasayugalādisādhakāni honti.
atk-s0512a:2037_21: Evaṃ itarehipi tikehi catukkādīhi ca yathāsambhavaṃ tikāni ca catukkādīni ca yojetabbāni.
atk-s0512a:2038_0: Evaṃ chabbidhānampi pana imāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ catūhi adhiṭṭhānehi saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-s0512a:2038_14: Tattha avisesato tāva lokuttaraguṇe katābhinīhārassa anukampitasabbasattassa mahāsattassa paṭiññānurūpaṃ sabbapāramipariggahato saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2039_0: Visesato pana yācakajanaṃ avisaṃvādetvā dassāmīti paṭijānanato paṭiññaṃ avisaṃvādetvā dānato dānaṃ avisaṃvādetvā
atk-s0512a:2039_2: yathārahaṃ yathākālaṃ yathāvidhānañca dānato paññuttarato ca kusaladhammānaṃ caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ dānaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2039_3: Tathā saṃvarasamādānassa avītikkamanato dussīlyapariccāgato duccaritavūpasamanato paññuttarato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ sīlaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2040_10: upasamādhiṭṭhānapariggahitāni saccacāgapaññādhiṭṭhānāni kilesapariḷāhavūpasamanato kāmūpasamanato kāmapariḷāhavūpasamanato ca,
atk-s0512a:2040_11: paññādhiṭṭhānapariggahitāni saccacāgūpasamādhiṭṭhānāni ñāṇapubbaṅgamato ñāṇānuparivattanato cāti evaṃ
atk-s0512a:2040_12: sabbāpi pāramiyo saccappabhāvitā cāgaparibyañjitā upasamopabrūhitā paññāparisuddhā.
atk-s0512a:2040_20: Ādimajjhapariyosānesu paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ tasmiṃ sati sambhavato asati abhāvato yathāpaṭiññañca bhāvato.
atk-s0512a:2041_0: Tattha mahāpurisā satatamattahitaparahitakarehi garupiyabhāvakarehi saccacāgādhiṭṭhānehi gihibhūtā āmisadānena pare anuggaṇhanti.
atk-s0512a:2041_1: Tathā attahitaparahitakarehi garupiyabhāvakarehi upasamapaññādhiṭṭhānehi ca pabbajitabhūtā dhammadānena pare anuggaṇhanti.
atk-s0512a:2042_2: Tatra hi gabbhokkantiṭhitiabhinikkhamanesu paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena sato sampajāno saccādhiṭṭhānapāripūriyā
atk-s0512a:2042_3: sampatijāto uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gantvā sabbā disā oloketvā saccānuparivattinā vacasā –
atk-s0512a:2043_1: Cāgādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena mahato ñātiparivaṭṭassa hatthagatassa ca cakkavattirajjassa anapekkhapariccāgoti.
atk-s0512a:2044_0: Dutiye ṭhāne abhisambodhiyaṃ caturadhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇanti keci.
atk-s0512a:2044_1: Tattha hi yathāpaṭiññaṃ saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ abhisamayo,
atk-s0512a:2045_0: Tatiye ṭhāne dhammacakkappavattane caturadhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇanti aññe.
atk-s0512a:2045_1: Tattha hi saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa dvādasahi ākārehi ariyasaccadesanāya saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2045_3: Upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa sayaṃ upasantassa paresaṃ upasamanena upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2046_0: Catutthe ṭhāne parinibbāne caturadhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇanti apare.
atk-s0512a:2046_1: Tatra hi parinibbutattā paramatthasaccasampattiyā saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2046_5: Tatra mahāpurisassa visesena mettākhette abhijātiyaṃ saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa saccādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇamabhibyattaṃ,
atk-s0512a:2046_8: visesena upekkhākhette parinibbāne upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa upasamādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇamabhibyattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2047_5: Tathā saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena dosāgatiṃ na gacchati avisaṃvādanato.
atk-s0512a:2047_8: Paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena mohāgatiṃ na gacchati yathā bhūtāvabodhato.
atk-s0512a:2048_12: Karuṇāpaññāpariggahitā hi dānādiguṇā mahābodhisambhārā bhavanti buddhattasiddhipariyosānāti.
atk-s0512a:2049_1: Sakalassāpi puññādisambhārassa sammāsambodhiṃ uddissa anavasesasambharaṇaṃ avekallakāritāyogena,
atk-s0512a:2049_5: Taṃ panassa kālaparimāṇaṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0512a:2049_7: Tathā mahāsattena bodhāya paṭipajjantena sammāsambodhāya buddhānaṃ puretarameva attā niyyātetabbo –
atk-s0512a:2049_12: tesaṃ pana dinnāvasesaṃ eva mayā paribhuñjitabba”nti.
atk-s0512a:2050_0: Evaṃ hissa sammadeva pariccāgāya kate cittābhisaṅkhāre yaṃ uppajjati pariggahavatthu aviññāṇakaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ vā,
atk-s0512a:2050_1: tattha ye ime pubbe dāne akataparicayo,
atk-s0512a:2050_5: tesu yadā mahābodhisattassa saṃvijjamānesu deyyadhammesu paccupaṭṭhite ca yācakajane dāne cittaṃ na pakkhandati na kamati.
atk-s0512a:2050_6: Tena niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ “addhāhaṃ dāne pubbe akataparicayo,
atk-s0512a:2050_7: tena me etarahi dātukamyatā citte na saṇṭhātī”ti.
atk-s0512a:2050_8: So evaṃ me ito paraṃ dānābhirataṃ cittaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0512a:2050_10: nanu mayā paṭikacceva pariggahavatthu yācakānaṃ pariccattanti dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇī vosaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
atk-s0512a:2050_11: Evaṃ mahāsattassa paṭhamo dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
atk-s0512a:2051_0: Tathā mahāsatto deyyadhammassa parittabhāve sati vekalle ca iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0512a:2051_1: “ahaṃ kho pubbe adānasīlatāya etarahi evaṃ paccayavikalo jāto,
atk-s0512a:2051_2: tasmā idāni mayā parittena vā hīnena vā yathāladdhena deyyadhammena attānaṃ pīḷetvāpi dānameva dātabbaṃ,
atk-s0512a:2051_4: So itarītarena taṃ dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇī vosaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
atk-s0512a:2051_5: Evaṃ mahāsattassa dutiyo dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
atk-s0512a:2052_0: Tathā mahāsatto deyyadhammassa uḷāramanuññatāya adātukamyatācitte uppajjamāne iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0512a:2052_1: “nanu tayā sappurisa uḷāratamā sabbaseṭṭhā sammāsambodhi abhipatthitā,
atk-s0512a:2052_2: tasmā tadatthaṃ tayā uḷāramanuññe eva deyyadhamme dātuṃ yuttarūpa”nti.
atk-s0512a:2052_3: So uḷāraṃ manuññañca deti muttacāgo payatapāṇī vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
atk-s0512a:2052_4: Evaṃ mahāpurisassa tatiyo dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
atk-s0512a:2053_0: Tathā mahāsatto dānaṃ dento yadā deyyadhammassa parikkhayaṃ passati,
atk-s0512a:2053_4: Api ca me pubbe tādisassa dānassa akatattā evaṃ bhogānaṃ parikkhayo dissati,
atk-s0512a:2053_5: handāhaṃ yathāladdhena deyyadhammena parittena vā vipulena vā dānameva dadeyyaṃ,
atk-s0512a:2053_7: So yathāladdhena dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇī vosaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
atk-s0512a:2053_8: Evaṃ mahāsattassa catuttho dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
atk-s0512a:2053_9: Evaṃ ye ye dānapāramiyā vinibandhabhūtā anatthā,
atk-s0512a:2053_10: tesaṃ tesaṃ yathārahaṃ paccavekkhitvā paṭivinodanaṃ upāyo.
atk-s0512a:2054_0: Api ca yaṃ mahāsattassa buddhānaṃ attasanniyyātanaṃ,
atk-s0512a:2054_2: Buddhānañhi attānaṃ niyyātetvā ṭhito mahāpuriso tattha tattha bodhisambhārapāripūriyā ghaṭento vāyamanto
atk-s0512a:2054_3: sarīrassa sukhūpakaraṇānañca upacchedakesu dussahesupi kicchesu durabhisambhavesupi sattasaṅkhārasamupanītesu
atk-s0512a:2054_4: anatthesu tibbesu pāṇaharesu “ayaṃ mayā attabhāvo buddhānaṃ pariccatto,
atk-s0512a:2054_5: yaṃ vā taṃ vā ettha hotū”ti taṃnimittaṃ na kampati na vedhati,
atk-s0512a:2055_0: Api ca samāsato katābhinīhārassa attani sinehassa parisosanaṃ paresu ca sinehassa parivaḍḍhanaṃ etāsaṃ sampādanūpāyo.
atk-s0512a:2055_1: Sammāsambodhisamadhigamāya hi katamahāpaṇidhānassa mahāsattassa yāthāvato parijānanena sabbesu dhammesu
atk-s0512a:2055_2: anupalittassa attani sineho parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0512a:2055_3: mahākaruṇāsamāsevanena pana piyaputte viya sabbasatte sampassamānassa tesu mettākaruṇāsineho parivaḍḍhati,
atk-s0512a:2055_6: accantaṃ janassa saṅgahakaraṇena upari yānattaye avatāraṇaṃ paripācanañca karoti.
atk-s0512a:2056_0: Mahāsattānañhi mahākaruṇā mahāpaññā ca dānena alaṅkatā,
atk-s0512a:2056_4: Tesaṃ sabbepi satte attanā nibbisese katvā bodhisambhāresu paṭipajjantānaṃ sabbattha samānasukhadukkhatāya samānattatāya siddhi.
atk-s0512a:2056_5: Buddhabhūtānampi ca teheva catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi caturadhiṭṭhānaparipūritābhivuddhehi janassa accantikasaṅgahakaraṇena abhivinayanaṃ sijjhati.
atk-s0512a:2060_0: Nirapekkho ca sabbattha, aho acchariyo jino.
atk-s0512a:2062_0: Sadā sattahite yutto, aho acchariyo jino.
atk-s0512a:2064_0: Uyyutto akilāsū ca, aho acchariyo jino”ti.
atk-s0512a:2065_1: Heṭṭhimena tāva paricchedena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni mahākappānaṃ satasahassañca,
atk-s0512a:2065_3: uparimena pana soḷasa asaṅkhyeyyāni mahākappānaṃ satasahassañca.
atk-s0512a:2065_4: Ete ca bhedā yathākkamaṃ paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena ñātabbā.
atk-s0512a:2065_5: Paññādhikānañhi saddhā mandā hoti paññā tikkhā,
atk-s0512a:2065_8: paññānubhāvena ca sammāsambodhi adhigantabbāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2066_0: Apare pana “vīriyassa tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvena bodhisattānaṃ ayaṃ kālavibhāgo”ti vadanti.
atk-s0512a:2066_1: Avisesena pana vimuttiparipācanīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvena yathāvuttakālabhedena bodhisambhārā
atk-s0512a:2066_2: tesaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchantīti tayopete kālabhedā yuttātipi vadanti.
atk-s0512a:2066_3: Evaṃ tividhā hi bodhisattā abhinīhārakkhaṇe bhavanti ugghahaṭitaññūvipañcitaññūneyyabhedena.
atk-s0512a:2066_5: so sammāsambuddhassa sammukhā catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ suṇanto gāthāya tatiyapade apariyosite eva chahi abhiññāhi
atk-s0512a:2066_6: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ adhigantuṃ samatthūpanissayo hoti,
atk-s0512a:2067_0: Dutiyo bhagavato sammukhā catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ suṇanto apariyosite eva gāthāya catutthapade chahi abhiññāhi
atk-s0512a:2068_0: Itaro pana bhagavato sammukhā catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā pariyositāya gāthāya chahi abhiññāhi arahattaṃ pattuṃ samatthūpanissayo hoti.
atk-s0512a:2069_0: Tayopete vinā kālabhedena katābhinīhāro buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇā ca anukkamena pāramiyo paripūrentā
atk-s0512a:2069_2: Tesu tesu pana kālabhedesu aparipuṇṇesu te te mahāsattā divase divase vessantaradānasadisaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2069_3: dentāpi tadanurūpe sīlādisabbapāramidhamme ācinantāpi pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajantāpi ñātatthacariyā
atk-s0512a:2069_4: lokatthacariyā buddhatthacariyā paramakoṭiṃ pāpentāpi antarā ca sammāsambuddhā bhavissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Kasmā?
atk-s0512a:2069_6: Paricchinnakālanipphāditaṃ viya hi sassaṃ yathāvuttakālaparicchedena parinipphāditā sammāsambodhi tadanantarā
atk-s0512a:2069_7: sabbussāhena vāyamantenāpi na sakkā adhigantunti pāramipāripūri yathāvuttakālavisesena sampajjatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2070_0: Ko ānisaṃsoti? Ye te katābhinīhārānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ –
atk-s0512a:2076_0: Jāyamānā manussesu, jaccandhā na bhavanti te.
atk-s0512a:2086_2: bodhisatto tusitā kāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṃ okkamatī”tiādinā soḷasa acchariyabbhutadhammappakārā,
atk-s0512a:2086_6: bodhisatte ayaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhatī”tiādinā ca dvattiṃsa pubbanimittappakārā,
atk-s0512a:2086_7: ye vā panaññepi bodhisattānaṃ adhippāyasamijjhanaṃ kammādīsu vasībhāvoti evamādayo tattha tattha jātakabuddhavaṃsādīsu dassitākārā ānisaṃsā,
atk-s0512a:2087_0: Api ca yasmā bodhisatto abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya sabbasattānaṃ pitusamo hoti hitesitāya,
atk-s0512a:2087_1: dakkhiṇeyyako garu bhāvanīyo paramañca puññakkhettaṃ hoti guṇavisesayogena.
atk-s0512a:2087_7: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ uḷārena vaṇṇena uḷārena yasena uḷārena sukhena uḷārena balena uḷārena ādhipateyyena aññe satte abhibhavati puññavisesayogato.
atk-s0512a:2088_16: tattha sattānaṃ bhayādayo upaddavā yebhuyyena anuppannā nuppajjanti,
atk-s0512a:2088_19: na tattha pacurajano viya dukkhena adhimattaṃ pīḷīyati,
atk-s0512a:2088_21: Tasmā mahāpurisassa yathārahaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave labbhamānā ete sattānaṃ pitusamatādakkhiṇeyyatādayo guṇavisesā ānisaṃsāti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a:2089_0: Tathā āyusampadā rūpasampadā kulasampadā issariyasampadā ādeyyavacanatā mahānubhāvatāti etepi mahāpurisassa pāramīnaṃ ānisaṃsāti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a:2089_1: Tattha āyusampadā nāma tassaṃ tassaṃ upapattiyaṃ dīghāyukatā ciraṭṭhitikatā,
atk-s0512a:2089_5: tāya rūpappamāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ pasādāvaho hoti sambhāvanīyo.
atk-s0512a:2089_9: Issariyasampadā nāma mahāvibhavatā mahesakkhatā mahāparivāratā ca,
atk-s0512a:2090_5: sayameva pana pare aññadatthu abhibhavati dhammena samena yathābhūtaguṇehi ca,
atk-s0512a:2090_7: sayañca aparimāṇassa puññasambhārassa parivuḍḍhihetubhūtā yānattaye sattānaṃ avatāraṇassa paripācanassa ca kāraṇabhūtāti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a:2091_5: Yāvatā pana buddhaguṇā ye anekehipi kappehi sammāsambuddhenāpi vācāya pariyosāpetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0512a:2092_0: “Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṃ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
atk-s0512a:2093_0: Khīyetha kappo ciradīghamantare, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”ti. ;
atk-s0512a:2095_0: Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ “datvā dātabbakaṃ dāna”ntiādinā sabbāpi pāramī ekajjhaṃ dassetvā parato “kosajjaṃ bhayato
atk-s0512a:2095_2: taṃ yehi vīriyārambhamettābhāvanā appamādavihārehi yathāvuttā buddhakārakadhammā visadabhāvaṃ gatā sammāsambodhisaṅkhātā
atk-s0512a:2096_1: vīriyārambhañca khematoti iminā paṭipakkhe ādīnavadassanamukhena vīriyārambhe ānisaṃsaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0512a:2099_1: Vitthārato pana sakalena buddhavacanena pakāsitā sabbāpi sampattiyo ekanteneva sammappadhānādhīnā,
atk-s0512a:2099_2: tasmā bhagavā vīriyārambhe niyojetvā “esā buddhānusāsanī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a:2100_1: yvāyaṃ sabbasaṃkilesamūlabhāvato sabbānatthavidhāyakanti kosajjaṃ bhayato tappaṭipakkhato catūhi yogehi
atk-s0512a:2100_2: anupaddavabhāvasādhanato vīriyārambhañca khemato disvā adhisīlasikkhādisampādanavasena vīriyassa ārambho
atk-s0512a:2100_6: esā buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ anusāsanī anusiṭṭhi ovādoti.
atk-s0512a:2101_5: Atha vā avivādanti avivādahetubhūtaṃ chabbidhaṃ sāraṇīyadhammaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2101_7: kāyena ceva cittena ca sahitā aviramitā aviyuttāti attho.
atk-s0512a:2101_10: Esā buddhānusāsanīti ettha sabbena sabbaṃ vivādamanupagamma yadidaṃ chasāraṇīyadhammaparipūraṇavasena samaggavāse niyojanaṃ,
atk-s0512a:2101_12: Samaggavāsañhi vasamānā sīladiṭṭhisāmaññagatā avivadamānā sukheneva tisso sikkhā paripūressantīti satthā
atk-s0512a:2102_1: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pamussanaṃ akusalesu ca dhammesu cittavossaggaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2102_4: kāyaduccarite vā vacīduccarite vā manoduccarite vā pañcasu vā kāmaguṇesu cittassa vosaggo vosaggānuppadānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2103_2: Atthato hi appamādo nāma satiyā avippavāso,
atk-s0512a:2103_3: “satiyā avippavāso”ti ca niccaṃ upaṭṭhitāya satiyā evetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2103_4: Apare pana “satisampajaññappadhānā tathā pavattā cattāro arūpino khandhā appamādo”ti vadanti.
atk-s0512a:2103_5: Yasmā pana appamādabhāvanā nāma visuṃ ekā bhāvanā natthi.
atk-s0512a:2104_0: Visesato pana vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ kāyikavācasikasaṃvarañca upādāya sabbā sīlabhāvanā,
atk-s0512a:2104_6: “Appamādo”ti hi idaṃ padaṃ mahantaṃ atthaṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0512a:2104_8: sakalampi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ āharitvā appamādapadassa atthaṃ katvā kathento dhammakathiko “atitthena pakkhando”ti na vattabbo. Kasmā?
atk-s0512a:2104_10: Tathā hi sammāsambuddho kusinārāyaṃ yamakasālānamantare parinibbānasamaye nipanno abhisambodhito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0512a:2104_11: pañcacattālīsāya vassesu attanā bhāsitaṃ dhammaṃ ekeneva padena saṅgahetvā dassento “appamādena sampādethā”ti
atk-s0512a:2104_24: Tattha appamādabhāvanaṃ sikhāppattaṃ dassento satthā “bhāvethaṭṭhaṅgikaṃ magga”nti āha.
atk-s0512a:2105_1: yo esa sīlādikhandhattayasaṅgaho sammādiṭṭhipubbaṅgamo sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃyeva aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo,
atk-s0512a:2105_3: Dassanamaggamatte aṭhatvā upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ uppādanavasena vaḍḍhetha,
atk-s0512a:2105_5: Esā buddhānusāsanīti yadidaṃ kusalesu dhammesu appamajjanaṃ,
atk-s0512a:2105_6: tañca ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggassa bhāvanā esā buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ anusiṭṭhi ovādoti.
atk-s0512a:2106_1: Itthaṃ sudantiādīsu itthanti kappe ca satasahassetiādinā pakārena.
atk-s0512a:2106_4: Attano pubbacariyanti purimāsu akittipaṇḍitādijātīsu attano paṭipattidukkarakiriyaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2106_5: Sambhāvayamānoti hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sammadeva pakāsento.
atk-s0512a:2106_6: Buddhāpadāniyaṃ nāmāti buddhānaṃ purātanakammaṃ porāṇaṃ dukkarakiriyaṃ adhikicca pavattattā desitattā buddhāpadāniyanti evaṃnāmakaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2106_10: taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca na vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2121_0: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
atk-s0512a:2126_0: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
